paragraphs: Say hello (again!) to athleisure, the style movement once backed largely by supermodels like Gigi Hadid and Hailey Bieber but now making a firm comeback. For most of us, a matching sweatsuit or crop-top-and-legging combo would only be appropriate for hitting the gym or running weekend errands. However, with the current coronavirus outbreak and the need to stay home and flatten the curve, pajamas, comfortable loungewear, and, in this case, sporty sweatsuit attire are all becoming more important than ever.

Plus, if you prefer to lounge around in sweats, you’re in luck. A matching set makes for a more elevated and effortlessly put-together at-home look, even when that means head-to-toe cotton, French terry, or fleece. A coordinated sweatsuit is a comfortable choice for watching movies or working on puzzles, making quick runs to stock up on necessities, or even doing actual workouts without having to change. A little effort goes a long way when it comes to loungewear. Choose from monochrome matchers (a win-win for comfort-seeking minimalists) to heritage, sport-inspired sets for those who wish to stick to the more athletic end of the spectrum.
Here, find 17 matching sweatsuits for the athleisure take on the stay-at-home wardrobe.
